description.full: Welcome to the Homefront™ Multiplayer Beta. It's 2027 and America has fallen to a savage military occupation. Engage in escalating large-scale battles featuring infantry, vehicles, aircraft, drones and airstrikes between the US armed forces and the KPA.
description.short: Welcome to the Homefront™ Multiplayer Beta. It's 2027 and America has fallen to a savage military occupation. Engage in escalating large-scale battles featuring infantry, vehicles, aircraft, drones and airstrikes between the US armed forces and the KPA.
